alert.note: Alert for Grant Grove Area; Kaiser to Rodgers Ridge; Kings Canyon NP; Sequoia NP; South End of the Upper Sierra; Upper San Joaquin River; Yosemite NP outside of the valley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 20 at 12:07PM PST until January 21 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM PST SUNDAY ABOVE 6000 FEET... ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM SUNDAY TO 1 AM PST TUESDAY ABOVE 7000 FEET... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory above 6000 feet, snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to 10 inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. For the Winter Storm Warning above 7000 feet, heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 8 to 16 inches with local amounts up to 20 inches. * WHERE...The Sierra Nevada. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 4 PM PST Sunday. For the Winter Storm Warning, from 10 PM Sunday to 1 AM PST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Grant Grove Area; Kaiser to Rodgers Ridge; Kings Canyon NP; Sequoia NP; South End of the Upper Sierra; Upper San Joaquin River; Yosemite NP outside of the valley
